about_the_game:
You are a fish.

Armed with your grappling hook-equipped sniper rifle, go on the ultimate krilling spree in Hook Line & Sniper! In this fast-paced arcade shooter, rack up points by mastering your arsenal and maximizing your style. Battle foes in and above the sea, show no mercy, and prove who’s the REAL apex predator!





  • Grapple into the sky or divebomb into enemies
  • Build your arsenal as you progress
  • Quickly swap between weapons on the fly, boosting moment-to-moment gameplay
  • It’s badass





  • Easy to pick up, with copious opportunities for skill expression
  • Take on several unique challenges
  • Overflow the style meter in your own fishy way





  • Traverse beautiful ocean scenery
  • Battle all that the sea has to offer, from exploding pufferfish to flying pirate shrimps
  • Watch out for hazards, or else you’re Fish Finished!

  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2016
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200, AMD Athlon XE BE-2300
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Full Vulkan 1.0 Support
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2016
